citations.narrative:
In the small eastern most kennel building there is a spot that has been dug out between the first and second outdoor run
on the south side that allows that dogs from the two enclosures to move back of forth under the fencing.
Crawling under the fencing could cause the dogs injury and the is an increased risk of escape or incompatible dogs
coming into contact.
Primary enclosures must contain dogs securely.
Correction Date: October 19th 2023

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
In the eastern most building that was a buildup of rodent droppings in the building between the enclosures. There a was
mouse in a trap. The rodent droppings and mouse were directly next to a primary enclosure.
Exposure to rodents and rodent droppings is a risk for spread of disease and can cause illness to animals.
An effective program to control pest and reduce contamination by the pests in animal areas must be established.
Correction Date: October 19th 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(iii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
In the small eastern most kennel building there is a spot that has been dug out between the first and second outdoor run 
on the south side that allows that dogs from the two enclosures to move back of forth under the fencing.  
Crawling under the fencing could cause the dogs injury and the is an increased risk of escape or incompatible dogs 
coming into contact.  
Primary enclosures must contain dogs securely. 
Correction Date: October 19th 2023 
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
In the eastern most building that was a buildup of rodent droppings in the building between the enclosures. There a was 
mouse in a trap. The rodent droppings and mouse were directly next to a primary enclosure.  
Exposure to rodents and rodent droppings is a risk for spread of disease and can cause illness to animals.  
An effective program to control pest and reduce contamination by the pests in animal areas must be established.  
Correction Date: October 19th 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
